workflow.name: Clear integration of GPT-4 with key tools for enhanced functionality
workflow.description:
Turn discovery call forms into polished, personalized proposals in seconds. This workflow captures prospect information via Typeform, uses GPT-4 to write compelling proposal content, and automatically creates professional PandaDoc documents with pricing tables.

**Who is this for?**

Freelancers, consultants, agencies, and service businesses who want to:
- Stop spending hours writing proposals manually
- Respond to prospects faster with professional documents
- Maintain consistent proposal quality at scale

**What problem does it solve?**

Writing proposals is time-consuming and inconsistent. This workflow automates the entire process‚Äîfrom form submission to ready-to-send document‚Äîwhile keeping your proposals personalized and professional.

**How it works**

1. Prospect fills out your Typeform discovery questionnaire
2. Workflow validates required fields (email, company name)
3. AI automatically selects the right template based on budget and project complexity
4. GPT-4 writes personalized proposal content tailored to the prospect's challenges
5. GPT-4 generates realistic project milestones
6. PandaDoc creates a professional document with pricing table
7. You receive a Slack notification with a direct link to review

**Template selection logic**

The workflow intelligently routes to the appropriate template:

- **Quick Quote** ‚Üí Budget under $2,500 AND simple project
- **Standard Proposal** ‚Üí Budget $2,500+ OR complex project

**What you get**

- Personalized proposal content written by GPT-4
- Challenge summary that shows you understand their pain points
- Specific benefits with metrics (time savings, cost savings)
- 4-phase project timeline with realistic milestones
- Professional PandaDoc document with pricing table
- Slack notifications for successes and errors

**Setup time:** 15-20 minutes

**Setup steps**

1. Add your OpenAI API credential (select in the 3 GPT nodes)
2. Add your Typeform API credential
3. Add your PandaDoc API credential (HTTP Header Auth with your API key)
4. Create a Typeform with discovery questions (see below)
5. Create 2 PandaDoc templates (Quick Quote + Standard Proposal)
6. Update the Config node with your company info and template IDs
7. Add your Slack webhook URL to the Config node

**Typeform questions needed**

Your discovery form should include these fields:
- What's your company name?
- What industry are you in?
- What's your biggest operational challenge?
- What would the ideal solution look like?
- What tools/platforms do you currently use?
- How complex is this project? (Simple / Moderate / Complex)
- What's your estimated budget? (Under $1,500 / $1,500-$2,500 / $2,500-$5,000 / $5,000-$10,000 / $10,000+)
- First name
- Last name
- Email address

**PandaDoc template tokens**

Your PandaDoc templates should include these placeholder tokens:
- Client.Company, Client.FirstName, Client.LastName
- Client.ChallengeSummary
- Project.Total, Project.Deposit
- Project.TimeSavings, Project.CostSavings
- Timeline.Phase1-4, Timeline.Phase1Date-4Date
- Impact.Bullet1-3
- Proposal.ExpiryDate, Document.Date

**Requirements**

- OpenAI API account (~$0.05-0.15 per proposal)
- Typeform account (free tier works)
- PandaDoc account (API access required)
- Slack workspace (for notifications)

**Good to know**

- Processing time: 15-30 seconds per proposal
- All errors are caught and sent to Slack so you can follow up manually
- The Config node centralizes all settings‚Äîeasy to customize
- GPT prompts are editable to match your writing style
- Budget threshold is adjustable (default: $2,500)
- Quick Quote proposals expire in 7 days, Standard in 14 days

workflow.name: AI Proposal Generator - Typeform to PandaDoc with GPT-4

parameters.content:
## üìÑ AI Proposal Generator

Automatically generate professional, personalized proposals from discovery call intake forms.

### How it works
1. **Prospect submits** Typeform with project details
2. **Workflow validates** required fields (email, company)
3. **AI selects template** based on budget & complexity
4. **GPT-4 writes** personalized proposal content
5. **GPT-4 generates** realistic project milestones
6. **PandaDoc creates** professional document with pricing
7. **Slack notifies** you with direct link to review

### Setup (15-20 minutes)
‚òê Add **OpenAI API** credential (select in GPT nodes)
‚òê Add **Typeform API** credential
‚òê Add **PandaDoc API** credential (HTTP Header Auth)
‚òê Create Typeform with discovery questions
‚òê Create 2 PandaDoc templates (Quick Quote + Standard)
‚òê Update **Config** node with your company info
‚òê Set your **Slack webhook URL** in Config

### Customize
- Adjust **quickQuoteThreshold** in Config (default: $2,500)
- Edit GPT prompts to match your writing style
- Add industry-specific case studies to Config

## 1. Capture & Extract

This section handles the intake process:

**Config** ‚Üí Stores your company info, PandaDoc template IDs, Slack webhook, and case studies

**Typeform Trigger** ‚Üí Fires when prospect submits discovery form

**Extract & Transform Data** ‚Üí Parses all form fields, converts budget ranges to numbers, calculates deposit amounts, and determines which template to use

## 2. Validate & Route to AI

Ensures data quality before AI processing:

**Check Required Fields** ‚Üí Validates email and company name exist (routes to error if missing)

**Route: Quick Quote or Standard?** ‚Üí Budget < $2,500 AND not complex ‚Üí Quick Quote. Otherwise ‚Üí Standard Proposal

**AI: Generate Quick Quote** ‚Üí GPT-4 writes concise 1-page quote with benefits and pricing

**AI: Generate Standard Proposal** ‚Üí GPT-4 writes detailed multi-page proposal with deliverables and ROI

## 3. Parse, Timeline & Merge

Processes AI output and adds project schedule:

**Parse AI Proposal Response** ‚Üí Extracts JSON from GPT response, handles markdown cleanup, merges with form data

**AI: Generate Project Milestones** ‚Üí GPT-4 creates 4-phase timeline based on solution complexity

**Parse Milestone Response** ‚Üí Extracts timeline JSON with fallback defaults if parsing fails

**Combine Proposal + Milestones** ‚Üí Merges proposal content with timeline for complete document data

## 4. Create PandaDoc

Assembles the final proposal document:

**Check: AI Parse Successful?** ‚Üí Routes to error notification if GPT response couldn't be parsed

**Create PandaDoc Document** ‚Üí Sends all data to PandaDoc API, populates template tokens, builds pricing table

**Check: Document Created?** ‚Üí Verifies PandaDoc returned a document ID

## 5. Send Notifications

Keeps you informed of every submission:

**Notify: Proposal Ready** ‚Üí Rich Slack message with client name, value, template type, expiry date, and direct PandaDoc link

**Notify: PandaDoc Failed** ‚Üí Error details so you can manually follow up with the prospect

values.content: You are a professional proposal writer for an automation agency. Write concise, benefit-focused proposals that emphasize ROI and time savings.
You are a professional proposal writer for an automation agency. Write detailed, compelling proposals that demonstrate deep understanding of the client's business and clearly articulate ROI.
You are a project manager who creates realistic, client-friendly project timelines for automation projects.

parameters.content:
## ‚ö†Ô∏è Error Handling

Captures issues at every stage:

**Notify: GPT Parse Failed** ‚Üí AI response wasn't valid JSON

**Notify: Missing Required Fields** ‚Üí Form submitted without email or company name

Both errors include client details so you can manually reach out

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
